inclusion.criterion: consented to the study and extensive baseline testing will be completed at St. Luke's Episcopal Hospital in Houston, Texas.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: his/her own bone marrow harvested and later injected, if randomized to receive active treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: NOGA mapping is performed and the processed cells or placebo are injected under electromechanical guidance into the affected areas of the left ventricle.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Follow-up testing, including quality of life and NOGA mapping, is done at the time of injection, as well as at 6 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Canadian cardiovascular (CV) Class II-IV angina and/or congestive heart failure (CHF) symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ejection fraction less than or equal to 45%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reversible perfusion defect on single photon emission computed tomography (SPECT)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Coronary artery disease (CAD) unable to be corrected by surgery (bypass) or intervention (stent)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Age less than 18 or greater than 70
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of cancer in last 5 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: HIV positive; hepatitis B or C positive.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular wall thickness less than 8 mm
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recent heart attack within the last 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and is currently under treatment. She has a history of C-section and one child, but no other significant medical conditions that would exclude her from the study.
